caption: The Winter Break has arrived!! 🥳 Happy Christmas to all who celebrate! 🎄🎅🏼🎉 #winterbreak #christmas2024 #muinteoir #irishprimaryteacher #teacherfriends #teachercommunity #teachersfollowteachers

✨ Exciting news! ✨

From January, I’ll be acting up in a new role as AP1 for STEM in my school! While I have loved being AP2 for Learn Together, school ethos, Student Council and wellbeing—areas I’m incredibly passionate about and love sharing here—I’m looking forward to this new challenge and the opportunity to dive deeper into STEM education.

Inclusive multicultural education is still an area I am passionate about so I’ll be continuing to share this type of content here on Instagram going forward, with maybe some sprinklings of Maths, Science and/or Technology on occasion. 

Here’s to new beginnings and exciting adventures ahead! 🌟

A lovely picture book for any class learning a little bit about Hanukkah at the moment! There are loads of read aloud videos of this story available online too so could be a nice one even while the children are eating their lunch. 🙂
